families.name: Pastels
families.description: Soft, light colours that bring calm and airiness to a space. Think powder blues, blush pinks, and mint greens.

families.name: Brights
families.description: Vivid, saturated colours that energise and uplift. Perfect for accent walls and statement rooms.

families.name: Jewel Tones
families.description: Rich, deep colours inspired by precious gemstones. Emeralds, sapphires, and amethysts for luxurious spaces.

families.name: Earth Tones
families.description: Warm, grounded colours drawn from nature. Terracotta, ochre, and olive for an organic feel.

families.name: Darks
families.description: Bold, dramatic colours that create intimacy and depth. Charcoals, navy, and deep forest greens.

families.name: Warm Neutrals
families.description: Understated warm tones that create a cosy foundation. Creams, taupes, and warm greys.

families.name: Cool Neutrals
families.description: Understated cool tones that create a serene foundation. Cool greys, blue-whites, and soft silvers.
